title: Docker for Beginners - Linux
description: In this lab, we will look at some basic Docker commands and a simple build-ship-run workflow. We'll start by running some simple containers, then we'll use a Dockerfile to build a custom app. Finally, we'll look at how to use bind mounts to modify a running container as you might if you were actively developing using Docker.

meta.title: Docker for Beginners - Linux Tutorial
meta.description: Learn the basics of Docker, including running simple containers, building custom apps, and using bind mounts for development.
meta.keywords: linux lab, beginner, linux practice exercises, online kali linux terminal, practice linux commands online, linux practice online, docker command line, docker playground, tutorial, linux labs
